headline: Why Fox (FOXA) Is Up 6.2% After Murdoch Trust Deal Ends and Digital Focus Grows
summary: Fox Corp. and News Corp. recently resolved the longstanding Murdoch family trust dispute, with three siblings agreeing to a US$1.1 billion payout each and the buyout financed through a US$1 billion loan backed by company stock. This pact clarifies Fox's leadership future under Lachlan Murdoch, while the company’s acquisitions such as Tubi and the launch of Fox One highlight a shift toward expanding digital and streaming revenues. We’ll now explore how resolving the Murdoch family dispute and...

headline: Is Fox Corporation Stock Outperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: Though Fox Corporation has outpaced the broader Nasdaq Composite over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
